New Records: Carlos Rodon set a career high with his 32nd start of the year
Key Match Events: Tommy Kahnle allowed a go-ahead, two-run homer to the Pirates in the eighth inning
The Pirates tied the game with back-to-back home runs in the sixth inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees aimed to secure home-field advantage in the ALCS with a win
Post-Match Reflections: Jazz Chisholm Jr. expressed confidence in the team's World Series aspirations
Carlos Rodon highlighted the importance of the postseason and the team's determination
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees rested key players like Aaron Judge and Giancarlo Stanton
The loss prevented the Yankees from clinching the top seed in the AL
Others: The game marked the Pirates' victory in the series
